name: employee-attendance-root
description: Root package to manage employee attendance app

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix "[{name}]" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" --names "Backend,Frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix "[{name}]" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" --names "Backend,Frontend" "npm start --prefix backend" "npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run preview --prefix frontend"
